Hi all: I see in ubuntu are Add/remove and apt-get
whats is the different between both them?
apt-get is a command line utility and Add/Remove is a graphical easy-to-use interface for installing software. But not all software is available through Add/Remove
why not?
every application in Add/Remove has an image. But, for instance, the build-essential package doesn't have a picture.
But for almost everything you can find a suitable application in Add/Remove
